item.title: Kubernetes + EKS + Github Actions
item.description: Creation of a **website**, hosted on a **Kubernetes cluster**. Use **Kubectl**, **Kustomize** and **Github actions** to deploy it in a **GitOps** way.

item.title: Github Actions + Hugo + Terraform + S3
item.description: Creation of a static website with **Hugo**. Host it on **S3** with **CloudFront**. Use **Terraform** and **Github actions** to deploy it in a **GitOps** way.

item.title: GitOps + Terraform
item.description: Manage the **content and infrastructure** of a website in a git monorepo. **Deploy automatically** with each push.
